issue.title: [C++] Flush the output stream at the end of each PrettyPrint function
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1493](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1493). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I noticed a case where `std::cout` was being used with `arrow::PrettyPrint` and a portion of the bytes written to the stream were not being flushed.
